name: DigitalFilmV5 Lite
author: optimusprimal
description:
Category: Cel Animation
Purpose: Traditional Animation

Upscaling Dragon Ball Z DBox DVD's. - grainy sources. It keeps some grain, but also doing some cleaning, sharpening, and fixing.
dataset: DB/DBZ/DBGT Dragon Box DVD frames, upscaled with various models such as DigitalFrames2.0, FilmFrames677k, SharpAnimeV2, and manually edited to only show the best parts of each model. I call it image stacking.
